name: The Floor is now Lava
description:
The floor is now lava.

It's burning everything.
You too.
Avoid flames, avoid lava, put your feet in safe zones.
Reach a safe place.
You fail? Retry.

Check your times in the Menu and at the end of the game!
Best time will be in the title room!

If you experience the "out of place controls" write me your smartphone model.
The ads disappear after few seconds or you can switch it off.
